value: Condorcet: Bonjour, mon amis and welcome to the french revolution. Your name is ||name||, isn't it? And you've got a very nice ||creature||, even if it's not that strong yet. We are in Paris at the end of the 18th century and you have to help us to win the revolution!

Spartacus: Hey ||name||, nice ||creature|| you have there! You are now a slave and must fight as a gladiator to survive and maybe one day become free, but for now I am going to be your Mentor and train you. Let's see how good you are.
